title: Santoshi Maa Sunayein Vrat Kathayein
overview: Santoshi Maa Sunayein Vrat Kathayein is a Hindi religious show about an ardent devotee of Goddess Santoshi, who speaks about the importance of fasting and proper ways of worshipping her. Goddess Poulomi is jealous of Goddess Santoshi and leaves no stone unturned to create havoc in her devotees' life.
